Rasual Butler

Pronunciation: \rah-SOOL\

Rasual Butler

(Formerly known as Felix Cheeseborough)

(Sual Bop)

Position: Small Forward and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-7, 215lb (201cm, 97kg)

Born: May 23, 1979 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania us

Died: January 31, 2018

College: La Salle

High School: Roman Catholic in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania

Recruiting Rank: 1998 (37)

Draft: Miami Heat, 2nd round (24th pick, 53rd overall), 2002 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 30, 2002

Career Length: 13 years

Rasual Butler was born on May 23, 1979.

Rasual Butler weighed 215 lbs (97 kg) when playing.

Rasual Butler is not in the Hall of Fame.

Small Forward and Shooting Guard.

Rasual Butler last played in 2016.

Rasual Butler won 0 championships.
